where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( d <* dimensional_size | NOT ( SIZEOF ( USEDIN ( d , '' ) ) >0 ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( t <* tolerance_value | NOT ( SIZEOF ( USEDIN ( t , '' ) ) >0 ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( ent <* geometric_tolerance | NOT allowed_translations (ent, ['description', 'name']) ))=0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( ent <* topological_representation_item | NOT allowed_translations (ent, ['name']) ))=0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( sr <* shape_representation | ( sr. name ='hybrid 3d shape representation' ) AND ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( i <* sr. items | NOT ( schema_name + '.GEOMETRIC_REPRESENTATION_ITEM' IN TYPEOF ( i ) ) ) ) >0 )) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( tzd <* tolerance_zone_definition | SIZEOF( tzd. boundaries ) >2 ) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( fi <* founded_item | NOT ( type_check_function ( fi , [schema_name + '.COMPOSITE_CURVE_SEGMENT' , schema_name + '.SURFACE_PATCH' , schema_name + '.VIEW_VOLUME'] , 3 ) ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( r <* representation | NOT ( type_check_function ( r , [schema_name + '.CONSTRUCTIVE_GEOMETRY_REPRESENTATION' , schema_name + '.CONTACT_RATIO_REPRESENTATION' , schema_name + '.DEFAULT_TOLERANCE_TABLE' , schema_name + '.DEFINITIONAL_REPRESENTATION' , schema_name + '.HARDNESS_REPRESENTATION' , schema_name + '.MECHANICAL_DESIGN_GEOMETRIC_PRESENTATION_REPRESENTATION' , schema_name + '.MOMENTS_OF_INERTIA_REPRESENTATION' , schema_name + '.PRESENTATION_REPRESENTATION' , schema_name + '.SHAPE_REPRESENTATION' , schema_name + '.SURFACE_TEXTURE_REPRESENTATION' , schema_name + '.SYMBOL_REPRESENTATION' , schema_name + '.TACTILE_APPEARANCE_REPRESENTATION' , schema_name + '.TEXT_STRING_REPRESENTATION' , schema_name + '.VISUAL_APPEARANCE_REPRESENTATION'] , 3 ) ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( sar <* shape_aspect_relationship | NOT ( type_check_function ( sar , [schema_name + '.DIMENSIONAL_LOCATION' , schema_name + '.SHAPE_ASPECT_ASSOCIATIVITY' , schema_name + '.SHAPE_ASPECT_DERIVING_RELATIONSHIP' , schema_name + '.SHAPE_DEFINING_RELATIONSHIP'] , 3 ) ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( sr <* shape_representation | NOT ( type_check_function ( sr , [schema_name + '.ADVANCED_BREP_SHAPE_REPRESENTATION' , schema_name + '.CSG_SHAPE_REPRESENTATION' , schema_name + '.EDGE_BASED_WIREFRAME_SHAPE_REPRESENTATION' , schema_name + '.FACETED_BREP_SHAPE_REPRESENTATION' , schema_name + '.GEOMETRICALLY_BOUNDED_2D_WIREFRAME_REPRESENTATION' , schema_name + '.GEOMETRICALLY_BOUNDED_SURFACE_SHAPE_REPRESENTATION' , schema_name + '.GEOMETRICALLY_BOUNDED_WIREFRAME_SHAPE_REPRESENTATION' , schema_name + '.MANIFOLD_SURFACE_SHAPE_REPRESENTATION' , schema_name + '.NON_MANIFOLD_SURFACE_SHAPE_REPRESENTATION' ] , 3 ) ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( fi <* founded_item | NOT ( type_check_function ( fi , [schema_name + '.COMPOSITE_CURVE_SEGMENT' , schema_name + '.SURFACE_PATCH' , schema_name + '.VIEW_VOLUME'] , 0) ) ) ) =0
